mapper.select: select t.TILE_NM tile_nm, b.BEACON_MJR beacon_mjr, b.BEACON_MNR beacon_mnr from tile t LEFT OUTER JOIN beacon b ON t.BEACON_CODE = b.BEACON_CODE
